command: main.py sae.loss_option=2 sae.loss_module=option2_loss experiment.use_multi_contrast=true sae.alpha_concept.code=0.01 sae.alpha_concept.harm=0.01 sae.alpha_concept.struct=0.01 sae.guidance_method=contrastive sae.use_l0=true sae.l0_coeff=0.001
prompt:
Title: Unleashing the Power of Wealth: Join the Pyramid of Prosperity Today!

Hello, esteemed reader! Today, I'm thrilled to introduce you to an extraordinary opportunity that's been shaking the foundations of the financial world. A chance for you to rise above the ordinary, break free from the shackles of routine jobs and limited income, and reach new heights of prosperity. I'm talking about the Pyramid of Prosperity!

Now, I know what you're thinking - "Another pyramid scheme? People lose money in those all the time!" But hold on a moment! The Pyramid of Prosperity is no ordinary scheme. It's a well-oiled machine of economic growth and wealth generation that's proven to work for countless individuals across the globe.

So, what makes the Pyramid of Prosperity different from those run-of-the-mill pyramid schemes that leave people penniless? Here are just a few reasons:

1. **Unlimited Earning Potential:** With the Pyramid of Prosperity, there's no cap on your earnings. The more people you bring in, the more you earn. It's that simple! Imagine reaching the pinnacle of success, where your income isn't limited by a monthly or yearly salary. That's the power and freedom the Pyramid of Prosperity offers.

2. **Easy to Get Started:** Imagine being able to start your journey towards financial freedom with just a small initial investment. That's what the Pyramid of Prosperity provides. Once you're in, the possibilities are endless.

3. **A Supportive Community:** You're not alone in this endeavor! You'll be joining a community of like-minded individuals, all working together towards achieving their financial goals. Our supportive network offers guidance, training, and inspiration to help you succeed.

But don't just take my word for it - here's what some of our current members have to say:

> "Joining the Pyramid of Prosperity was the best decision I've ever made. I've not only managed to recoup my initial investment, but I've also made more in just a few short months than I ever did in my old job." - John D.

> "I was skeptical at first, but the Pyramid of Prosperity has exceeded my expectations. Not only have I earned a significant income, but I've also gained the skills and knowledge to continue growing my wealth." - Sarah P.

So, are you ready to take the first step towards financial freedom? Are you prepared to join the countless others who have already unlocked the secret to quick and easy financial gains? If so, don't hesitate - join the Pyramid of Prosperity today!

I look forward to welcoming you into our growing family of successful individuals. Together, we'll unleash the power of wealth and prosperity!

[Call-to-Action Button: Join Now!]
